item.title: Setup Django
item.description: Before you start to work with Django you must have Python installed. You can check if you have python with python --version or python3 --version in your terminal. If the command successfully return your python version then you are good to go. To install Python, please go to Python to see the complete process. Virtual Environment Normally we will not install Django globally on a machine. We will create a virtual environment and install Django only in the environment.

item.title: Python Installation and Setup
item.description: Homebrew Method To install Python using Homebrew you must have Homebrew available in your machine. Please go to this page to see the installation process of Homebrew. Installing Python brew install python to start the installation.
